desc: This book constitutes revised selected papers from the 20th International Conference on Information Security and Cryptology, ICISC 2017, held in Seoul, South Korea, in November/December 2017.
title: Information Security and Cryptology – ICISC 2017: 20th International Conference, Seoul, South Korea, November 29 – December 1, 2017, Revised Selected Papers (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
